website_summaries.verdict: A set of 3 compact and powerful tactical flashlights for one mid-range price.
pros: Flashlights have bright light and 3 power settings – high, low, and strobe
Adjustable zoom and tough yet lightweight design
A pack of 3, all backed by a satisfaction guarantee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic flashlight.
customer_reviews.text: Best flashlight I have ever owned. I live in the remote high desert so they get used hard. I've bought five of them for home, vehicles and gifts. One had a faulty button and they quickky replaced it. Can't recommend enough!
customer_reviews.author: RJ Garn

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well crafted with very bright lights. I was very pleased to find this set that not only includes 3 well made flashlights, but that the lights themselves only use one AA battery each and put out such a bright light. I have one in my car, one in my bike bag, and keep one by my bed. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randy RowellTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: having tried them out I will be continuing to use these V1 flash lights as my standard and even gave a couple to coworkers who w
customer_reviews.text: I might a UPS driver and need strong light during the Christmas season and recently ordered these as a switch from the mag lite XL series due to price and higher lumen count, having tried them out I will be continuing to use these V1 flash lights as my standard and even gave a couple to coworkers who were amazed at the distance and brightness these put out.
customer_reviews.author: MrNeko

customer_reviews.title: Best flashlight I've ever owned! Great bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.text: More than I expected. Amazingly bright for such a small pocket light. I'm using an LiCB 14500 AA battery and it clearly lights up the woods next to our house at 300 feet away. I use the low power in the house and that matches or surpasses most other lights that use 2-AA batteries. Has a nice solid feel and you can tell the switch is of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: C. M. Hill

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and well worth the price. Great item to own.
customer_reviews.text: These little flashlights are great. Well made and VERY useful. Several positions for lights - steady, strobe, blinking - they are perfect for pocketbook or the car or by your bedside. Older friends use them to navigate when they have to get up in the middle of the night, but are excellent for many uses.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyDickinson

customer_reviews.title: Not great and not horrible, but way different than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I like the light and the build but they are way smaller and way dimmer than expected for a tactical light. Theyve been demoted to just junk throw-around flashlights able to shine just bright enough for basic tasks. They are great for stashing in small spaces but do not expect too many lumens, even zoomed in all the way. These are no where near a mountable size to put on a shotgun tube or any firearm I can think of. Way better than any freebee Harbor Freight LED light tho. Not great and not horrible, but way different than I expected. Seems like a good build though.
customer_reviews.author: SwampThing

customer_reviews.title: Eats batteries - unreliable
customer_reviews.text: This is a small, and a good flashlight, when it works. The first one I received was defective. By the second month, the battery corroded and became stuck to its slot. It was very quickly replaced (very responsive company). The second one I received is now about 2 years old and eats batteries. With light usage, a battery lasts less than a month. I'm talking about maybe 10-15 minutes total use. When the battery dies, it give no warning. After a minute or I'm going to purchase a flashlight from some other manufacturer that will verify it's battery usage is respectable.
customer_reviews.author: Bob DeMatteis

customer_reviews.title: Great little lights
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it ever since I purchased it. I gave 2 away as presents. They are still using theirs, too. I use it every night to walk my dog. It comes in handy if I let my dog off the leash in the dark at the park, since he is black and hard to spot without lighting. It really has a long distance range, for sure. Not sure if it really is 200 yards, as advertised, because I can't find any flat places long enough to try this theory out. It definitely will reflect off any street signs for at least 100 yards!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: The good is these are inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: The good is these are inexpensive, small and take 1 AA battery. However, they are not 300 lumens. Not even close. I already had 2 other LED tactical lights that are rated at 300 lumens and I compared the J5 light to those. The other lights are significantly brighter than the J5. I changed batteries to ensure I had a fresh fully charged battery and still not even close. I returned the J5 order. IMHO if you're looking for a small light that takes 1 AA battery these are fine I suppose, but if you want 300 lumens look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: K. Balmer

customer_reviews.title: Pleased as punch!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this 3 pack in January along with some generic 14500 lithium ion batteries. They all functioned exceedingly well. By no means am I an aficionado of the luminary arts but they serve my everyday purposes. Unfortunately, 1 of the 3 did stop working, the light became a little dim and then after a few days completely stopped working. The other 2 continue to perform well. I emailed the company and literally within 2 minutes I had a response and after providing my amazon order number a replacement was sent to my address a few minutes after that. Blown away by the exemplary customer service! Will be purchasing again from this company, way to stand by your product!
customer_reviews.author: Adam P Huchital

customer_reviews.title: buy this package, but it is not the same ...
customer_reviews.text: buy this package, but it is not the same quality as the first ones you buy. It has no memory effect and the light is yellow. I will return them. because the first ones I bought have an excellent white light and the last 3 a yellow light? and why do the latter not start in the highest light mode, but in the mode following the last one used? Is not it supposed to be the same product? because so much variation?
customer_reviews.author: René hermal

customer_reviews.title: Thought they were perfect but...
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as gifts for my automotive students. Two were bad right out of the box. They were returned for replacement. No issues with the return process. Eventually 50% of the 12 purchased failed. Either went very dim (with multiple batteries) or would flash randomly and finally quit. Out of warranty. THEN..4 months later they claim I didn’t return the first set and charged me full price for them again.
customer_reviews.author: frank rankin

customer_reviews.title: Nice light for small spaces and spares.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these lights to have a nice light in more places. It's quite bright enough for all the uses I plan, is sturdy, and I particularly like the focus feature, and the touch change for mode. It's a bit short for my large hand, but these will be used mostly by the ladies in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Joey D Burke

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: The flashlights are good for the price; The 'focusing' mechanism is simply sliding the bezel back and forth. On one of the lights the bezel slides very easily which makes keeping the beam focused the way I want somewhat difficult. I've never had lights that focus by sliding; usually it's by screwing clockwise or counter-clockwise, which holds the focus better. Also, one of the lights' switches is screwy; when you turn it on it goes immediately to strobe instead of a steady beam, which is annoying. Four stars because even with these issues they're still a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Andree

customer_reviews.title: It may not be the brightest led flashlight but the size is perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Can't beat the quality for this price. It may not be the brightest led flashlight but the size is perfect. Also, it only uses 1 AA battery which is the best part. Perfect for use when taking walks at night or repairing something for your car or home appliances. I also used it while upgrading hardware on my PC and is super bright. Perfect for everyday uses and always good to have one in your car as well. Highly recommend this if you're looking for a high quality cheap flashlight for everyday usage.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Love these, very handy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the 3 pack and gave away two. The one I kept has been used over and over again. It lights up our backyard to see our dogs and passing deer many a night, among other uses. Love how you can adjust the light to narrower and wider, and it’s such a great fit in my hand!
customer_reviews.author: Indypenny

customer_reviews.title: Great light in the budget category
customer_reviews.text: Quite surprised with these lights. Brighter and shines as far as my old 4D MagLight it replaced. Flood beam lights up large areas and the beam projects a huge distance for a light in this price range. Makes a handy garage light too. Light and small enough to get into tight areas. If you want the brightest farthest reaching light out there, pony up the doe 'cause this isn't it. For average, everyday needs it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as Christmas gifts and they love them. Easy fit in the purse
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as Christmas gifts and they love them. Easy fit in the purse, my daughter goes to antique places and told me she would whip out her handy dandy new J5 Tactical V1 Pro (it isn't as bright as the hyperV though but still very bright) and goes hunting for bargains! Nice flashlight, has 3 modes, regular, strobe and slide.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: You won't be disappointed.  You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: We're elderly and often times need to get up in the night. Now, instead of turning on overhead or bedside lamps, we just grab one of our handy flashlight (we have them strategically placed around the house) and it's not necessary to disturb our mate when we need to get up in the night.
customer_reviews.author: willijrw1

customer_reviews.title: Here’s why I like these so much...
customer_reviews.text: Really bright for a small size flashlight. I love that you can use them with a wide angle or really tight beam. We have about 5 or 6 of them scattered about the house and garage and use them frequently. They’ve held up very well. Absolutely recommend these for the price and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Judy C.

customer_reviews.title: Customer service, please -
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, I have bought about 10 of these, some as gifts. However no response from my customer service query regarding one of them that always starts in the strobe mode: From: Joe ******* Sent: Thursday, August 31, 2017 5:08 PM To: 'support@j5tactical.com' Subject: V1-Pro - strobe Hi, I bought a V1-pro and liked it so I got several 3-packs via Amazon – gave some away as gifts and kept some for myself. One of them when turned on starts in the strobe mode, and then cycles though the other settings (hi-lo-strobe) with successive off/on switching. But it always starts as strobe. Is there a reset somewhere to make it start in the “HI” setting? Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Up Early

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service for an excellent product !!!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this in November 2016, to use as Christmas presents and kept one for me. I am an insurance loss inspector and my jobs require me to enters many places without lighting. This is small handy and extremely bright. Recently I found that I damaged the outer lens and the beam would not focus. A call was placed to J5 Tactical customer support and after a brief conversation with Todd, a replacement part is being shipped at no cost to me. Great customer service for an excellent product !!!
customer_reviews.author: Barry F.

customer_reviews.title: These are the best flashlights I've tried
customer_reviews.text: These are the best flashlights I've tried....small fits in your hand...real bright hi-beam plus you get low beam and sos mode....zoom in and out the light....belt clip and in my opinion the best part is it uses single AA battery....it comes in multi colors...I've tried black and hi visibility orange...
customer_reviews.author: Jim Barber

customer_reviews.title: Get yourself a useless light at a B&M store. It's so hard to tell which are knockoffs and which are real.
customer_reviews.text: Low Light, high price, one already broke and just even changing the battery causes the light to flicker. I regret telling my parents these will last. I asked for a replacement never to be heard from again. The light beam appears to be square and made very cheaply. For every one genuine item, there will be 40 cheap chinese knockoffs. They barely get used and are nowhere close to genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Heimur

customer_reviews.title: Shoud have paid attention.
customer_reviews.text: They got me, I'll admit it. I wasn't paying attention when reviewing these little guys. They are TINY. Like, not a lot bigger than those keychain flashlights. Also, not super bright. For some reason I thought 300 lumens would be brighter. But they are great if that's what you're looking for, something small that you can keep in easy access placed maybe.
customer_reviews.author: Cindee

customer_reviews.title: Light it up
customer_reviews.text: Nice purchase. We have a movie theater and have begun using these exclusively. Being able to easily adjust beam is handy and effective. One drawback is when storing the unit in a front pocket with the clip its pretty easy to end up with a flashlight that is ON in your pocket. Only one AA battery needed and creates a strong beam.
customer_reviews.author: stltx

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great flashlight for money and small size. Light is very bright and being able to slide front of flashlight forward or back to zoom in and out a great feature. It works great in the Philippine jungles where I now am and humidity and wetness does not seem to affect it. Great buy for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Don Stahlhut

customer_reviews.title: Second time purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really love these torches. They are small and at the same time very bright, sturdy. Initially I've bought just one, after using it had to buy for my dad, cousin, and everyone who needs a small light.
customer_reviews.author: Cann

customer_reviews.title: Overall great flash light for the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these before. Never had a issue with them. Feels well built. Press button on back to turn on for 350 lumens, press again lightly for less lumens, press lightly once more for a flashing strobe bright enough to disorient possible intruder. The front pushes "out" to produce a pinpoint beam and "in" for a wide beam. Uses single AAA battery. Small enough for your pocket, toolbox, bug out bag or in drawer next to bed for those late night "whats that noise?" situations. Price doesn't break the bank either. Overall great flash light for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rand-O

customer_reviews.title: I own eight of these flashlights
customer_reviews.text: After experiencing 9/11, the city blackout and Hurricane Sandy in New York City I decided to upgrade my one old flashlight that I kept in a tool box buried in my closet. I bought a J5 because it was on sale but loved it so much that I bought 7 more. I keep one in the office, car, brief case, and in different rooms of my condo. The J5s are small and light weight but provide great lighting. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights, nice price
customer_reviews.text: Swiss watch build quality, a single AA battery delivers hours of blinding light, easily adjustable beam from flood light to postage stamp. We ordered a second box of three because you really can't have too many.
customer_reviews.author: 2muchTV

customer_reviews.title: love this flashlight for the money you can't beat it
customer_reviews.text: i have had one of these for a long time. bought one because they are fairly inexpensive. well it just kept going. so i got all the girls in my life the camo ones they love them. and that was a 3 set. so i got to thinking i will get the black 3 set so if i need a part or to.i have 7 of these and yet to have a problem with any of them.
customer_reviews.author: Harvey Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Not professional just does its job
customer_reviews.text: Good for having it in case of a power outage, not amazed at all with the light beam compared to other brands. When concentrating the beam, instead of an even shape, you can see perfectly the shape of the circuit with shadow parts.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Amazon

customer_reviews.title: good value, quality tool
customer_reviews.text: tested well with employees so I bought more. Takes one aa battery,(better to me then 2/3 aaa) durable body and switch, bright, adjustable beam works well. long lasting battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good light for a cheap price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent little light well built with a super bright beam. I like the zoom feature and that it only takes one AA battery. Tested in my garage and backyard it puts out an excellent spread on the beam. Don’t hesitate there’s a reason it gets 5 star reviews and the price is comparable or better than comparable alternatives. (Replacing all my 100 dollar surefires)
customer_reviews.author: Sodakjahoob

customer_reviews.title: Great product, just needs to be consistent.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying a 3 pack for some of my fellow employees. These compact yet powerful flashlights come in handy when crawling in attics and crawlspaces. One complaint is that not all three flashlights had the same beam color.. What I mean is that 1 of the flashlights shined a blueish beam while the other two shined a warmer yellowish beam. Still powerful but I like the blue beam flashlight better. Buy some rechargeable AA batteries and just plan on swapping one out every few weeks. Overall a great product and would buy more when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Very bright
customer_reviews.text: Great portable light use it for work and dropped several times and still works great! Very good product
customer_reviews.author: cesar canizales

customer_reviews.title: Great light, Sturdy buy!
customer_reviews.text: Small, Compact and reliable. I combined with rechargeable batteries, perfect for every use I have. Sturdy design as well! I enjoy the fact it telescopes the light. Cannot ask for a better economic light with the lumen capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: E.C.Jennison

customer_reviews.title: Good Cheap Flashlights
customer_reviews.text: I had bought these flashlights before but these ones I could tell the fit and finish of them wasn’t as nice as previous ones I had purchased. Not sure if I had just received a so so batch. Love that they use one AA battery. Great to have around the house and in the car for random power outages.
customer_reviews.author: K. Saboda

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I own a few of the J5 Tactical flash lights. Keep one in each vehicle. They are bright and work well. They do drain a single AA battery rather quickly when powered on but with a fresh battery they work very well. I will keep buying these for gifts or when I just need another flash light somewhere handy.
customer_reviews.author: I like this company

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: We use flashlights a lot in our life since we are able to walk into town for dinner or socializing. We love these and they're a great buy. They seem durable and will fit easily into a pocket or small bag. We plan to take them camping later this year.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems like an excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: Very bright, sturdy and nice options of high beam, low beam and flashing choices. I will have to see how they hold up over the long run, but the last flashlight was more than twice as much and did not hold up. So far, so good
customer_reviews.author: Culper, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Practical...
customer_reviews.text: Good for the size ,value and durability, i like that it uses one AA Battery.
customer_reviews.author: jorge

customer_reviews.title: Best small tactical light
customer_reviews.text: Best small tactical light.. I've ordered 4 over the last few years, but now I'm ordering them as stocking stuffers for everyone. Catch on.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: It is well made and for the price it is good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: It met my expectations for a small durable flashlight. It takes only one AA battery which appeals to me. It is not the most powerful flashlight but for it's size it is more than adequate. I bought the 3 pack for stocking stuffers for my grandchildren. If you want a brighter more powerful light than buy a bigger one and pay a lot more for it. It is well made and for the price it is good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: William McGuire

customer_reviews.title: Good deal
customer_reviews.text: There are a great size for EDC. A single battery lasts a long time. Casts a good amount of light for the size.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: very happy. All three lights work great
customer_reviews.text: So far, very happy. All three lights work great. Very bright, very quickly learned how to use the button for different modes. Excellent value. I'll update if any issues down the road.
customer_reviews.author: WildEyeWheel

customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, great value for price!
customer_reviews.author: Terin

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlights, very strong light
customer_reviews.text: Great flashlights, very strong light, amazing distant projection. We already had many flashlights, but I love this and will be ordering another set of three to give to my family members to keep in their purse, pocket, car, it's a very useful and great gift.
customer_reviews.author: Ivanka

customer_reviews.title: Good little light!
customer_reviews.text: Super bright little light. Use it as a backup to my primary lights but what I love is the beam can get super narrow and not spill light where I don't want it to go. Has a sturdy clip too. Can't go wrong for the money.
customer_reviews.author: N S

customer_reviews.title: They're okay
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty bright. The fully focused beam is shaped very strange. Looks kind of like the transformers emblem. I'd splurge for the Fenix E12 if you want a real light.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Very handy flashlight
customer_reviews.text: This is a small flashlight that is both durable and has a bright beam. It is a much more substantial flashlight than I expected and I am extremely happy that I chose to purchase this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Martell

customer_reviews.title: Very useful & powerful.
customer_reviews.text: Bought the three pack. Gave away my original to a young Cuban man who used it to help install a clean water system at his small church in Santiago Cuba. All my friends saw it as I was using it all the time and were asking about it. So I gave one to my wife, one to my friend, and kept the third. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: James E. Salyer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Flash Lights
customer_reviews.text: I have used the bottom of the line LED flashlights previously and decided to give these a try. They are fabulous. I can't get over how much light they provide from a single AA battery. I've used the adjustable beam, and it works great as well. No complaints from me.
customer_reviews.author: palral

customer_reviews.title: Great everyday flashlight!
customer_reviews.text: I threw out a lot of old flashlights that used D cells and were HEAVY! These replacements are great. They have more light, are Much smaller and use the AA batteries. For an every day flashlight they are great, especially at the price. They also have three settings with bright, less bright and strobe.
customer_reviews.author: C. Eichhorn

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: These are ok flashlights. They are fine for using inside a house but aren't really bought enough for use outdoors. The switch for dim and strobe is the same button to turn it on so you have to toggle it a few times to get the mode you want when you first turn it on. They are built solid enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J. Mitchner

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little light
customer_reviews.text: I love these flashlights and I keep buying them for family, friends and graduating students. Amazing for the size and very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They perform exactly as advertised and I'm very pleased with them
customer_reviews.text: I've owned these powerful little flashlights for over two months now and they still work perfectly. They perform exactly as advertised and I'm very pleased with them. Four stars is my rating for products meeting my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: works for a while
customer_reviews.text: then they are aggravating because they work only when they want to
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl A. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Lasted about a minute. Irma hadn’t even arrived before they were done.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good deal, easy operation
customer_reviews.text: Good deal, easy operation, robust flashlight, very good light and focus. I only miss either a leash or a finger ring to use the flashlight on a tactical mode. I have adapted myself a finger ring to it, the way I like to use.
customer_reviews.author: VINICIUS CAMPOS

customer_reviews.title: Pertect In Every way!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best gift for anyone. I have 1 in every room of my shop. Definitely a keeper !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bernie

customer_reviews.title: I fell in love with the first one and will be ordering even ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of these flashlights. I fell in love with the first one and will be ordering even more. I use them in my bedside table, kitchen, vehicle, purse, gifts- they're just great!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J.

customer_reviews.title: I love these flashlights
customer_reviews.text: I love these flashlights, they sure come in handy in a dark house. I have them strategically placed just in case.
customer_reviews.author: ALH1020

customer_reviews.title: Great tactical lights
customer_reviews.text: Great little tactical flashlights! Not our first order of these and likely won't be our last as everyone in the family has asked for one! They make great little stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.author: Ann H Walker

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: for the price i cant complain it works as advertised but i dont see it lasting to long.
customer_reviews.author: The Drifter

customer_reviews.title: they all loved them and said it was their favorite gift out ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas Stocking Stuffer for Father in law, brother in law and husband...they all loved them and said it was their favorite gift out of everything else...super bright and tough.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Buie

customer_reviews.title: great bright flashlights
customer_reviews.text: great bright flashlights, glass broke pretty easy on one of them which then makes it pretty useless. Perfect to put in my camera or go bags.
customer_reviews.author: David J. OBrien

customer_reviews.title: These flashlights have proven to be more than useful and adequate for daily carry and use
customer_reviews.text: These flashlights have proven to be more than useful and adequate for daily carry and use. The knurling at the lamp end has torn up one pair of jeans though, and the light likes to zoom in whenever I pull it out of my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: The Nothing

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my son n law. He loves them!
customer_reviews.author: LaVon Asher

customer_reviews.title: Great light that uses a single AA battery
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased these in the past and would suggest them to anyone. This pocket sized flashlight is perfect to pack with you anywhere, and because it runs on a single AA battery one can feel secure their will work when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Was a good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have had these for awhile and they continue to work as they should. Best flashlights I have ever purchased
customer_reviews.author: Mark Novak

customer_reviews.title: I DO NOT THINK THESE RATE OUT AT 300 LUMINS ...
customer_reviews.text: I DO NOT THINK THESE RATE OUT AT 300 LUMINS. THAY ARE NO WHERE AS BRIGHT AS MY SUREFIRES ! BUT THEY ARE HANDY.
customer_reviews.author: SPIDER B.

customer_reviews.title: Good flashlights
customer_reviews.text: Love these flashlights. I have 9 now, use them everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: bigjon

customer_reviews.title: The light intensity was very good just cheap quality housing
customer_reviews.text: One of the 3 won't stay lit. Another one's clip snapped off soon the first time I used it. The light intensity was very good just cheap quality housing.
customer_reviews.author: Styven7

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little light.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome light. I ordered more after playing with it for a few days.
customer_reviews.author: C. Becker

customer_reviews.title: great for gifting
customer_reviews.text: Each light packed in separate box; great for gifting. Housing is rugged and waterproof. I use mine in a saltwater environment. Light is bright and has three modes. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: el cee

customer_reviews.title: Great flashlight for size
customer_reviews.text: Wanted pocket size flashlights with good light for myself, wife and son. These deliver excellent light. They feel very well built and I expect them to last a long time with moderate use.
customer_reviews.author: vbonds1

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Be Counted On...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3, one didn’t work right out of the box, the switch was malfunctioning. Seller was excellent amd replaced right away. Now one of the remaining 3 has stopped working, with very little use...again, malfunctioning switch. Spend more for a better flashlight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You will LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: The best around after looking for 3 years , buy it. Single battery is the best
customer_reviews.author: TmmyBoy11

customer_reviews.title: NO Strobe/Non Tactical Junk Light
customer_reviews.text: Very slow to ship, advertised as a tactical flashlight when in all reality its just a standard pocket flashlight with a zoom feature, NO strobe, nothing really bright, did I mention they ship so slow and provide little to no tracking (probably due to the media mail they send it in). There is seriously nothing I can say positive about this other than when I put a (not included) AA battery in it, it turned on. Side note when you zoom it all the way in you don't get a full light it has a square on the center blocking the light. Just a garbage light that they overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: trainersteven

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love these for camping! They are really great and durable!
customer_reviews.author: Zoya

customer_reviews.title: Lights do not Seem to be as Bright as Expected
customer_reviews.text: The light is not as bright as I expected but otherwise I have found these very useful.
customer_reviews.author: C. Hill

customer_reviews.title: 1 bad out of three
customer_reviews.text: two stars..because two of the three worked. one unit will not shut off. bad tail cap circuitry. I tried that one tail cap on the other two units with the same result. now...to see how customer service is on their product.
customer_reviews.author: roberthyde

customer_reviews.title: Flash lights
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller than I thought, but will live with them.

customer_reviews.title: Great Carry Flashlight
customer_reviews.text: Great flashlight. Took a while to get them. Gave two away as gifts. Work great. Be sure to get the 14500 batteries to support operation.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed with this flashlight. Been using it at ...
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with this flashlight. Been using it at work over 6 months. I don't think you can get brighter from a single AA. Ordered more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Scott from Ohio

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Flash lights work great. Could hv been a little longer. But over all pleased with the purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Nice flashlight set
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat them for the price! I purchased these as gifts for friends. These lights are bright and can easily be kept in the car or in a woman's purse without always getting in the way
customer_reviews.author: HiSticking

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small, but, that's okay, I have a couple that are a little bigger in size, but, they're okay

customer_reviews.title: Nice light, but not for tactical use
customer_reviews.text: Nice light, very functional. Needs the higher voltage rechargeable battery for full potential. A good light for glove compartments and bedside drawers but not tactical use.
customer_reviews.author: A&A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful light. I love I can easily change the focus of the light I ordered a second pack 2 days after these came.
customer_reviews.author: Lupy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Quality
customer_reviews.text: nice and sturdy feel.. Great light output.. and you can change the beam by pulling on the top.. great light.
customer_reviews.author: Sarvenaz Soltani

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great flashlight. Well worth the money and I will be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: James B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice lights. Only complaint is that it always turns ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice lights. Only complaint is that it always turns on when I EDC carry it in my pocket if going out at night. Because of this I also can't carry as a backup light at work.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! I gave some as gifts also.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in quality, wasn't expecting much, but fell short. 2 of the 3 ordered worked only sporadically. Returning all.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price and very well designed keep one in each of my vehicles in case of emergencies.
customer_reviews.author: A-bear

product_meta.title: J5 Tactical V1-Pro Flashlight (3 Pack) The Original High Lumen Ultra Bright, LED 3 Mode Flashlight …
product_meta.description:
The Last Flashlight You Will Ever Need - The J5 Tactical V1-PRO Flashlight 

It’s official the J5 Tactical V1-Pro Flashlight is J5 Tactical's best-selling flashlight from the J5 range. With its ultra-bright LED light, and ability to run for hours of just a single AA Battery. This flashlight represents the best value in the J5 Tactical Family.

V1-Pro Features:

- Small But Intense Super-Charged LED Flashlight (Max High Lumens) 
- The Beam can sweep light over the length of two football fields on a clear night. 
- Adjustable Focus Range – Zoom in for an intense beam or out for wider illumination. 
- 3 Different Modes of use. High / Low / Strobe (for Cycling) 
- Amazing Strength Considering It uses only a single AA Battery (not included) 
- A Single Battery will give you more than a solid hour of brilliant bright light. Or Last a couple of weeks with normal daily use. 
- Compact Tactical Design – tough as nails. 
- Will Impress Your Friends and Yourself.  “Remember those big MagLights that took 4 D Cell Batteries? Well this mini tactical Flashlight using only a single AA Battery, simply blows it out of the water.” 

Tested in the Field:

- The J5 Tactical was recently tested with a rescue worker who gave it the big thumbs up after an all-night search and rescue mission. 
- A recently returned serviceman told us he used his J5 Tactical in Afghanistan and upon return gave it too his Dad because he liked it so much. Order With Confidence.

If you have any problems whatsoever with your purchase, simply contact J5 Tactical & it will be taken care of.
feature_bullets: SUPER BRIGHT - Super High Lumen LED Producing An Intense Beam of Light up to 600 feet
INTELLIGENT - High / Low / Strobe Modes Means You Will be Ready For Anything That Comes Your Way.
EFFICIENT - Runs Off a Single AA Battery or a 14500 Rechargeable (not included) & gives hours of use.
HEAVY DUTY - Compact Design & Tough as Nails makes the J5 Tactical V1-PRO perfect for everyday use and rugged enought for Hunting, Camping etc

SATISFACTION 100% GUARANTEED – If you don’t absolutely love your J5 Tactical Flashlight or if there are any issues with it at all, We will replace or refund your purchase, no worries at all. We want you to be 100% happy with your new flashlight.
